#include "stdio.h"
#include "string.h"

int main()
{
	int t;
	char str[100];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int count=0,i;
		scanf("%s",str);
		for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
			if(str[i]=='A' || str[i]=='D' || str[i]=='O' || str[i]=='P' || str[i]=='Q' || str[i]=='R')
			count++;
			else if(str[i]=='B')
			count=count+2;
			printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	
}
